attributes.action: Immediately arrest Frank Skinner for suggesting he will create another World Cup song
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Frank Skinner has been polluting this country with his foul songs for too long.  It must now fall to the Prime Minister to take swift, immediate and ruthless action against this vile evil.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
